article_title: Clinton County to charge for old televisions and computers at landfill

article_metadata.author:
Joe LoTemplio, Press-Republican
E-mail: jlotemplio@pressrepublican.com
Twitter: @jlotemplio

og.description: Costs for disposing of items that contain toxic waste has skyrocketed, officials say.
